summary: A killer bandit decides to become a politician in order to avenge deaths in his family.
cast: Vivek Oberoi|Shatrughan Sinha|Sudeep|Abhimanyu Singh|Radhika Apte|Srinivasa Rao Kota|Raja Krishnamoorthy|Sushant Singh|Zarina Wahab|Sushmita Mukherjee|Ashish Vidyarthi|Vishwajeet Pradhan|Ashwini Kalsekar|Darshan Jariwala|Haritha|Shailendra Srivastava|Subrat Dutta|Anupam Shyam|Om Kumar|Chetanya Adib|Narsimha|Sukanya Kulkarni|Sanjay Mone|Madhu|Habib|Hussain|Anjali|Sukhwinder Singh|Chandra Shekhar Dutta|Rajendra Gupta|Ajaz Khan|Om Prakash|Priyamani|Chetan Sasithal|Suriya
title: Rakhta Charitra
